articles.title: Sixth Session of 13th SPA Held
articles.content:
Sixth Session of 13th SPA Held
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The Sixth Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK took place here on Wednesday.
					 Attending it were Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the SPA Presidium of the DPRK; Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK; Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and premier of the Cabinet; leading officials of the Party and government, the chairman of the C.C., Korean Social Democratic Party, deputies to the SPA, members of the SPA Presidium and senior officials of the armed forces organs.
					
					 Officials of party, armed forces and power organs, the Cabinet, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, factories, enterprises, co-op farms and educational and scientific research organs were on hand as observers.
					
					 The agenda items of the Sixth Session of the 13th SPA were decided at the session.
					
					 1. On review of the Cabinet's work for Juche 106 (2017) for carrying out the five-year strategy for national economic development, and tasks for Juche 107 (2018)
					
					 2. On summing up the execution of the state budget of the DPRK for Juche 106 (2017) and state budget for Juche 107 (2018)
					
					3. Organizational matters
					
					 Deputy Pak Pong Ju, premier of the Cabinet, made a report on the first agenda item at the session.
					
					 Deputy Ki Kwang Ho, minister of Finance, made a report on the second agenda item.
					
					 Deputies made speeches on the first and second agenda items.
					
					 Speakers said that last year the army and people of the DPRK made great progress in implementing the five-year strategy for the national economic development set forth at the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 They noted that the work of the Cabinet and the execution of state budget for last year were correctly reviewed and settled.   Saying that the tasks of the Cabinet and the state budget for this year were properly set out, they expressed support and approval for them.
					
					 They expressed their will to fulfill their responsibility and role in the drive for strengthening the independence and Juche character of the national economy and improving the people's standard of living.
					
					 Adopted at the session were a decision of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK "On approving the report on the work of the DPRK Cabinet and the summing up of the execution of the state budget for Juche 106 (2017)" and an ordinance of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK "On state budget of the DPRK for Juche 107 (2018)".
					
					 Organizational matters, the third agenda item, were discussed at the session.
					
					 At the proposal of the chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, Deputy Hwang Pyong So was dismissed from the post of its vice-chairman and Deputy Kim Ki Nam, Deputy Ri Man Gon and Kim Won Hong were dismissed from the posts of its members.
					
					 Upon the authorization of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, Deputies Kim Jong Gak, Pak Kwang Ho, Thae Jong Su and Jong Kyong Thaek were elected as members of the SAC of the DPRK to fill vacancies.
					
					 Upon the authorization of the C.C., WPK, Deputy Pak Thae Song was dismissed from the post of member of the SPA Presidium due to the transfer to other post and Deputy Jong Yong Guk was elected as secretary general of the SPA Presidium and Deputies Kim Su Gil, Pak Chol Min and Kim Chang Yop as members of the SPA Presidium to fill vacancies.
					
					 Deputy Pak Thae Dok was dismissed from the post of member of the Legislation Committee of the SPA and Deputies Ryang Jong Hun and Kim Myong Gil were elected as members of the Legislation Committee of the SPA to fill vacancies.

articles.title: Report on Fulfillment of Cabinet Work for Last Year and Its Tasks for This Year
articles.content:
Report on Fulfillment of Cabinet Work for Last Year and Its Tasks for This Year
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Deputy Pak Pong Ju, premier of the Cabinet, delivered a report on the fulfillment of the work of the Cabinet for Juche 106 (2017) for carrying out the five-year strategy for national economic development and its tasks for Juche 107 (2018) at the Sixth Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly held on Wednesday.
					 Last year was a year of great victory in which a great progress had been made in carrying out the five-year strategy for the national economic development under the outstanding and seasoned guidance of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, repelling unprecedentedly grave challenges stemming our advance, the reporter said.
					
					 According to the report, last year the Cabinet organized a drive for putting the nation's overall economy on a higher stage with a main emphasis put on revitalizing the production by locally producing equipment, raw and other materials on the principle of self-support and self-sufficiency while focusing the state efforts on augmenting the foundation for electricity production, rounding off the system of Juche iron production and realizing the independence of chemical industry in line with the five-year strategy for national economic development set forth by the Party.
					
					 All sectors and units of the national economy carried out a high-pitched drive for creation in the spirit of self-development and, as a result, lots of factories and enterprises honored their yearly gross industrial output value plans and those units associated with the leadership feats of our Party carried out their yearly national economy assignments.
					
					 The achievements made last year, a year of crucial importance in carrying out the five-year strategy for national economic development, proved once again that no desperate sanctions and pressure moves of the U.S. and its vassal forces to destroy the sovereignty of the DPRK and its rights to existence and development can ever check the progress of the Korean people dynamically advancing with firm faith in the validity of their cause and its final victory under the wise guidance of the Party and that the cause of building a powerful socialist country is sure to be accomplished.
					
					 Saying that this year we are faced with the tasks to make a breakthrough of revitalization in the economic front as a whole while frustrating the challenges of the hostile forces, who are making last-ditch efforts, through all-people offensive under the militant slogan of "Let us launch a revolutionary general offensive to achieve fresh victory on all fronts of building a powerful socialist country!", the reporter specified them.
					
					 The fighting goals for the third year of the five-year strategy for national economic development should be attained without fail with a firm hold on the key tasks of strengthening the independence and Juche character of the national economy and improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 The power industrial sector should put defective generation equipment into good shape and reinforce them, take scientific and technological measures for lowering the standard of coal consumption at thermal power plants and put the operation of the generation equipment additionally established in the Pukchang Thermal Power Complex on normal track and thus increase the electricity production with the use of thermal power source onto a high stage.
					
					 The coal industrial field should attain the monthly and quarterly coal production goals and create more coal fields so as to fully meet the demand for coal increasing in different sectors of the national economy.
					
					 In the field of metal industry, Korean-style Juche-based iron making production system should be further perfected by the use of oxygen heat blast furnace and efforts be put into improving the quality of steel and diversifying the kinds of steels through introduction of advanced technologies so as to fully meet the demand for iron and steel of the national economy.
					
					 The field of chemical industry should unconditionally hit the fertilizer production target to timely provide nitrogenous fertilizer to the agricultural field ahead of farming processes. The production at the February 8 Vinalon Complex should be invigorated to fully supply various chemical products including vinalon, caustic soda and vinyl chloride to various sectors of the national economy.
					
					 Along with the establishment of various catalyst production bases, the construction of main production processes should be pushed forward at the Sunchon Phosphate Fertilizer Factory and the process for production of carbonate of soda with glauberite as starting raw material should be renovated and perfected.
					
					 The machine industrial sector has to step up the modernization of machine factories, unconditionally hit the target for production of tractors and trucks and put the quality of machinery on the world level.
					
					 Advanced mining methods should be widely introduced to increase the production of minerals and nonferrous metal.
					
					 The railway transport sector should ensure in a responsible manner the transportation of materials necessary for various sectors of the national economy and capital construction projects.
					
					 The Cabinet will bring about a remarkable turn in improving the standard of people's living through production surge in the fields of light industry, agriculture and fisheries. 
					
					 Equipment and production processes should be rearranged on a manpower-saving and electricity-saving basis, diverse and quality light industrial goods produced on a larger quantity with locally available raw and other materials, and local economy should be developed in a peculiar way with reliance on the domestic resources.
					
					 High-yielding farming methods should be positively introduced and the proportion of farm work done by machines should be drastically increased to attain the grain production goal for this year without fail.
					
					 The fisheries field should unconditionally hit the fish production target and at the same time finish the construction of projects for consolidating the material and technical foundation of fisheries ahead of schedule.
					
					 Big efforts should be directed to sprucing up Samjiyon County into a standard and model county under socialism and the construction of the Wonsan-Kalma coastal tourist area should be finished within specified date. And such capital construction projects as the Tanchon Power Station and the second-phase waterway project in South Hwanghae Province should be pushed forward.
					
					 The more than 90 percentage rate of rooting of saplings should be ensured through planting of trees and good manuring and cultivation of planted trees and the appearance of the country be bettered through the technical renovation and repairing of highways and tourist roads in a qualitative way and the rearrangement of key rivers and streams based on an all-people movement.
					
					 All fields and units should solve scientific and technological problems arising in completing the domestic production of materials and equipment and structure of the self-supporting economy by keeping up science and technology.
					
					 The reporter stressed that the Cabinet and other state economic guidance organs would work out in a practical way an operation plan for hitting this year's targets and push forward its implementation in a responsible manner through skillful operation and command to successfully attain the fighting goals set forth by the Party and thus fully discharge  their responsibility and duty in glorifying this year marking the 70th anniversary of the DPRK as a year of victory to be specially recorded in the history of the country.

articles.title: Report on Fulfillment of State Budget for Last Year and on State Budget for This Year
articles.content:
Report on Fulfillment of State Budget for Last Year and on State Budget for This Year
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Deputy Ki Kwang Ho, minister of Finance, made a report on the fulfillment of state budget for Juche 106 (2017) and on the state budget for Juche 107 (2018) of the DPRK at the 6th session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly held on Wednesday.
					 According to the report, last year the state budgetary revenue plan was over-fulfilled by 1.7 percent or 4.9 percent increase from the previous year.
					
					 The local budgetary revenue plan was carried out at 100.5 percent.
					
					 Last year the state budgetary expenditure plan was carried out at 99.8 percent.
					
					 15.8 percent of the total expenditure was earmarked for the increasing of the military capabilities of the country and 47.7 percent for the development of the national economy.
					
					 Investment in the field of science and technology was increased to 108.5 percent as over the previous year, thus contributing to settling the scientific and technological problems arising in the economic development and to accomplishing the tasks for studying ultra-modern field.
					
					 5.2 percent more fund was allocated to key sectors of the national economy and for the improvement of people's livelihood than the previous year, thus actively promoting the drive for putting power, coal, metal, chemical, machinery and light industrial fields on a Juche basis and updating their production processes. In particular, it helped build a Korean-style oxygen heat blast furnace at the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex and attain the goal of producing new type tractors and trucks.
					
					 2.6 percent more investment was made for the construction field than the previous year, while 36.3 percent of the total expenditure was directed to facilitating the building of a highly-civilized socialist power, thus contributing to the implementation of the Party's policies of prioritizing the education and health care and to the development of sports and literature and arts. 
					
					 According to the report, the state budgetary revenue and expenditure for this year have been shaped in such a way as to carry out the five-year strategy for the national economic development.  
					
					 The state budgetary revenue envisages 3.2 percent increase over last year, of which the transaction tax, key item of the budgetary revenue, is expected to grow to 102.5 percent while the profits from state enterprises is expected to grow to 103.6 percent, to hold 85.3 percent of the total revenue.
					
					 The income from cooperative organizations is to grow to 100.9 percent, the real estate rent to 101.8 percent, the social insurance fee to 101.2 percent, while the revenue from property sales and price differences is to grow to 100.5 percent and other revenue to 100.8 percent. The revenue from economic trade zones is expected to grow to 102.5 percent.
					
					 The central budgetary revenue out of the state budgetary revenue stands at 73.9 percent which means that the revenue from the central economy holds an overwhelming proportion. Provinces, cities and counties are expected to balance expenditure with their own revenue and contribute lots of funds to the central budget.
					
					 The state budgetary expenditure is to grow to 105.1 percent over last year's.
					
					 An investment in strengthening the independence and Juche character of the national economy and improving the standard of people's living will increase to 104.9 percent as against last year and thus relevant fund will go to 47.6 percent of the total expenditure.
					
					 An investment in the field of science and technology will increase to 107.3 percent.
					
					 Expenditure for the overall national economy including power, metal, coal, chemical and machine industries, railway transport, light industry, agriculture and fisheries will increase to 105.5 percent. 
					
					 The financing necessary for actively promoting the capital construction and further expanding the achievements of forest restoration campaign will increase to 104.9 percent.
					
					 5.9 percent more fund will go to the education field, 6 percent more fund to public health, 105.1 percent to sports field and 103 percent to literature and arts.
					
					 15.9 percent of the total expenditure will go to increasing the military capabilities for self-defence.
					
					 This year also, lots of educational aid fund and stipends will be sent for the children of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The reporter said that the state budget for this year will be successfully carried out through meticulous organization of economic operation and command and thus financially back the building of a powerful socialist country.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks 6th Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of Top Posts of WPK and DPRK
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks 6th Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of Top Posts of WPK and DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the People's Palace of Culture here Wednesday to celebrate the 6th anniversary of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of the top posts of the Workers' Party of Korea and the State.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the WPK Central Committee, Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and premier of the Cabinet of the DPRK, senior officials of the party and government, the chairman of a friendly party, leading officials of the armed forces organs, deputies to the SPA, officials of the WPK Central Committee, armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, officers and men of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, teachers and students of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Kang Pan Sok Revol
					
					 utionary School, officials of organs, factories and enterprises and labor innovators in Pyongyang.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae made a report.
					
					 He said that Kim Jong Un's assumption of the top posts of the Korean revolution was the greatest honor of the country and the people, and a great auspicious event in national history which is of immense historic significance in carrying forward and accomplishing the Juche cause.
					
					 With his leadership over the party and the state, the WPK has become to enjoy greater prestige, and the DPRK has made to strikingly manifest its strategic position and tremendous might and the Korean revolution could advance with confidence toward the final victory, the reporter said, and continued:
					
					 The past six years were days when the overall state might of socialist Korea was put on the highest ground in the history of the nation under the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The history of human politics does not know such a matchless hero and peerless patriot as Kim Jong Un who has put the dignity and position of a country and a nation on the highest level in such a short period and created the new history of bolstering the socialist national power.
					
					 The country and people will never forget the great solicitude and patriotic exploits of the respected Supreme Leader who terminated the threat of aggression by the imperialists and provided a sure guarantee for the happiness of all posterity to come and the bright future, and will convey them generation after generation.
					
					 The reporter stressed that Kim Jong Un represents the powerful might of Juche Korea as he has displayed the independent dignity and might of the country all over the world, and is the great sun leading the 21st century, calling on all to dynamically fight toward the final victory of the cause of the Juche revolution, rallied close around the respected Supreme Leader.

 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the diplomatic corps here on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests including Aleksei Kozitski, chairman of the Maritime Territorial Branch Committee of "A Just Russia", and his party and a delegation of the Communist Party of the People of Spain led by Maria Teresa Pantoja Bargueno, member of the Political Bureau of the party who is secretary of the Anti-imperialist Solidarity, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Thursday.
					 They paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues in the palace.
					
					 At the halls where the great leaders lie in state, the visitors made bows to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them for field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Economic, Commercial Councilors Corps Visits Mangyongdae

					 They went round the revolutionary relics on Mangyong Hill.

Military Attaches Corps Visits Kimilsungia Festival Venue

Koreans in Japan Visit Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Sun visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Thursday.
					 The members of the group laid a bouquet at the statues of the great leaders before paying tribute to them.

articles.title: First Pyongyang Int'l Vocal Competition Closes
articles.content:
First Pyongyang Int'l Vocal Competition Closes
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The First Pyongyang International Vocal Competition, which began on April 5, closed on Thursday with due ceremony at the Moranbong Theatre.
					 Attending the closing ceremony were Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture who is chairman of the organizing committee of the competition, officials concerned, creators and artistes of national art organizations and teachers of art educational bodies, concours prize winners, foreign artistes, members of the international jury and honorary guests. 
					
					 Present on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies and officials of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Cups, medals, diplomas and prizes were awarded to those artistes who proved successful at the competition.
					
					 Kim Kyong Ju (DPRK) took the first place, Bayarsaikhan Batjargal (Mongolia) and Li Stanislav (Kazakhstan) the second place, and So Un Hyang (DPRK), Ryu Kum Chol (DPRK) and Martirosyan Marianna (Armenia) the third place.
					
					 A technical prize and an acting prize went to Baasansuren Enkhnaran (Mongolia) and Kapachinskikh Kirill (Kazakhstan).
					
					 Pak Chun Nam made a closing address.
					
					 At the end of the closing ceremony, there was a performance by prize winners of the competition.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants of Pyongyang Int'l Vocal Competition
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants of Pyongyang Int'l Vocal Competition
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the participants of the Pyongyang International Symposium-2018 on the era and the music arts held in the period of the First Pyongyang International Vocal Competition on Thursday.
					 During their stay in Pyongyang they have got to know better about the fact that all eye-opening miracles in the DPRK are a brilliant fruition of the wise guidance of respected HE Kim Jong Un who remains true to the intention and wishes of the great President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il, the letter said.
					
					 Noting they were greatly satisfied with the significant symposium, the letter expressed heartfelt thanks to Kim Jong Un who paid deep attention to making the First Pyongyang International Vocal Competition and the Symposium, an important occasion in promoting the development of world progressive music arts, successful.
					
					 It said that they would as ever take part in the international vocal competition in Pyongyang to further develop the vocal arts of mankind as required by the times and tangibly contribute to promoting the art exchange between the DPRK and various other countries.
					
					 It sincerely hoped that the friendly Korean people would invariably advance along the road of independence and Juche chosen by themselves under the leadership of Kim Jong Un and everything would go well in the DPRK.

articles.title: Pyongyang Int'l Symposium-2018 on Era and Music Arts Held
articles.content:
Pyongyang Int'l Symposium-2018 on Era and Music Arts Held
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang International Symposium-2018 on the era and the music arts was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday.
					 Present there were Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture who is chairman of the organizing committee of the First Pyongyang International Vocal Competition, officials, creators and artistes in the field of culture and arts, teachers and researchers of art education organs, jury members of the competition, honorary guests, members of the art troupes and delegations to the 31st April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
					
					 A congratulatory address was made at the symposium to be followed by speeches.
					
					 Speakers praised leader Kim Jong Il as an outstanding great master in ideology and theory as he gave scientific clarification of the nature and mission of music and, on this basis, put the music arts on the status of humanics.
					
					 They deeply explained and proved the scientific accuracy and validity of Kim Jong Il's Juche-oriented ideology and theory on music arts, and referred to the valuable experience gained in the course of creating the Korean-style operas which put the interrelationship between the words and melodies in vocal music pieces and the musical description on a high level.
					
					 Noting that it arises as a very important issue to strictly embody national identity in creation of music, they said vocalists can become popular singers only when they have proper aesthetic views and their performance suits to the national emotion and modern tastes.
					
					 A letter to the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the symposium.

articles.title: 20th Kimilsungia Festival Opens
articles.content:
20th Kimilsungia Festival Opens
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The 20th Kimilsungia Festival opened here with due ceremony at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition on Thursday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The festival on the theme of "Kimilsungias in full bloom with yearning for our leader" brought together at least 80 units including the ministries, national institutions, armed forces organs and working people from all walks of life and school youth and children that displayed tens of thousands of potted Kimilsungias.
					
					 Also displayed at the festival are immortal flowers cultivated by the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), overseas Koreans, foreign embassies and missions of international bodies here and friendship and solidarity organizations and individuals of different countries.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Pak Kwang Ho, vice-chairman of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Jon Kwang Ho, vice premier of the Cabinet, officials of the festival organizing committee and units that presented the flowers of the sun, service personnel, working people, delegations of overseas Koreans, overseas compatriots, staff members of the Indonesian embassy here, members of the societies for disseminating and supporting the immortal flowers and foreign guests.
					
					 Kim Chang Do, chairman of the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee, in an opening address said that Kimilsungia exhibitions would be held in different parts of the country and various countries, along with the festival in Pyongyang, to be crowed with masses praising and yearning for the President.
					
					 Bambang Hiendrasto, Indonesian ambassador to the DPRK, made a congratulatory speech.
					
					 The participants went round the festival venue full of flowers of the sun after the ceremony.

articles.title: First-day Performances of 31st April Spring Friendship Art Festival Held
articles.content:
First-day Performances of 31st April Spring Friendship Art Festival Held
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- First-day performances of the 31st April Spring Friendship Festival were given at theaters and music halls in Pyongyang on Thursday.
					International and home concour prize winners of various countries, famous artistes and Korean artistes from abroad gave a beautiful and gorgeous artistic depiction of the world people's reverence for the peerlessly great men.
					
					Colorful numbers reflecting the desire and wishes of mankind to build a new world free from war and servitude in the idea of independence, peace and friendship were put on the stage.
					
					Among the audience were members of the festival organizing committee, officials concerned, Pyongyangites, youths and students, foreign embassy officials and foreign guests staying here also watched the performances.
					
					Performances were given at the Pyongyang Grand Theater by the Volinaya Stepi Cossack Art Troupe of Russia, the Classical Ballet Group of the State Music Academy Theatre of Belarus, the Lao State Art Troupe, the Song and Dance Ensemble of the Mongolian Army, the Flamenco Band of Spain and the art troupe of Koreans in Japan.
					
					The Russian State Academic People's Chorus Named after M. E. articles.title: 3rd Sweet and Biscuit Sculpture Show Held
articles.content:
3rd Sweet and Biscuit Sculpture Show Held
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The third sweet and biscuit sculpture show was held at the Chongryu Restaurant from April 10 to 12 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

					 There was a demonstration show of talented cooks and skilled persons, who wonderfully produced sculptures within set time with their skillful performance.

articles.title: Songhwa Fine Art Exhibition Marks Day of Sun
articles.content:
Songhwa Fine Art Exhibition Marks Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The Songhwa Fine Art Exhibition in commemoration of the Day of the Sun opened at the Pyongyang International House of Culture Thursday.
					 On display there are more than 60 pieces including Korean painting, oil painting and water-color painting created by veteran painters with yearnings and reverence for President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Acryl painting "Best Wishes of All People" which depicted the images of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il is seen in the center of the exhibition hall.

articles.title: "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Vol. 20 Published
articles.content:
"Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Vol. 20 Published
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Vol. 20 was published in the DPRK.
					 The book, a cycle of the Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, systematically and comprehensively records the works of leader Kim Jong Il in a chronological order.
					
					 It carries 24 works including talks made by Kim Jong Il from April to May Juche 62(1973).
					
					 The work "Theory of Cinematic Art" originally clarifies the nature of the literature as humanics and its fundamentals on the basis of the Juche idea and gives comprehensive and scientific answers to the theoretical and practical problems arising in developing the cinematic art as required by a new era and desired by the popular masses and building socialist literature and arts.
					
					 Another work says that the 250-mile journey for learning made by President Kim Il Sung was one for the revolution and calls upon the schoolchildren to prepare themselves as revolutionary fighters loyal to the Party and the leader through the journey.
					
					 His other works call on the party officials to thoroughly apply the President's popular work method and style to the party work.
					
					 The book contains the works giving answers to the problems arising in preserving with care the nation's cultural heritage and covering mountains of the country with green woods by channeling great efforts to tree planting and forest protection.

articles.title: S. Korean Military Blasted for Arms Build-up
articles.content:
S. Korean Military Blasted for Arms Build-up
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- In the U.S. recently, there took place a ceremony for the purchase of F-35A Stealth fighters in the presence of south Korean military high-ranking officials including a vice minister of Defense. 
					 In the wake of the ceremony the south Korean military said that the Stealth fighters can infiltrate into the rear of the north and that it is the most dreadful weapon the north fears.
					
					 They have also announced that they will introduce 40 F-35A Stealth fighters by the year 2021 and deploy them for real war.
					
					 Minju Joson in a commentary Thursday brands such arms build-up as an unpardonable act of taking advantage of U.S. moves for aggression on the DPRK.
					
					 The commentary says:
					
					 If the south Korean military authorities think they can achieve something by overcoming military inferiority with the help of outsiders, nothing is more serious miscalculation than that.
					
					 Dialogue and confrontation and peace and war cannot go together and the military confrontation racket by the south Korean military warmongers will never work on us.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities are sincerely interested in the settlement of the national issue, they should blast the arrogant military's stance of confrontation with the fellow countrymen before anything else.
					
					 If they continue to allow the military to persist in the military conspiracy with foreign forces, they will follow in the footsteps of the conservative regime which met the miserable end forsaken by the people for its confrontation with the fellow countrymen and war moves to invade the north.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should bear in mind that all the fellow countrymen are watching them and think twice and behave themselves.

articles.title: Double-Dealing Attitude Will Never Succeed: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Double-Dealing Attitude Will Never Succeed: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the UN Security Council which kowtows to the U.S. included more DPRK-flagged vessels and transport and trading corporations in the "sanctions list", the largest of its kind in history, under the pretext of "violation of resolutions on sanctions on the DPRK".
					 What is disgusting here is the south Korean authorities' attitude of currying favor with their master U.S., as they praised the step as an "expression of the will to honor the implementation of the sanctions resolutions".
					
					 The U.S. and the forces following it have recently insisted that the present situation on the Korean peninsula is a clear proof that the sanctions on the DPRK are paying off and that the sanctions have to be maintained. Against this backdrop, they worked out the largest-ever "sanctions list" and the south Korean authorities took the lead in "supporting" it. This is double-dealing acts of having an axe to grind despite outward smile.
					
					 Today the Koreans' desire for improved north-south ties and reunification has gained momentum. Much upset by this, outsiders have become frantic in their moves to stifle the DPRK while deliberately chilling the atmosphere for national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 At this time, the south Korean authorities are supporting the U.S. racket for stifling their fellow countrymen by adopting a trite stance. This can not but be a crime before the nation who wishes for the lasting peace on the Korean peninsula and independent reunification through national cooperation.
					
					 The favorable atmosphere created on the Korean peninsula is never attributable to the sanctions by the U.S. and its vassal forces.
					
					 The reconciliation and unity, witnessed in the north-south relations that had been frozen with distrust and confrontation, and the phase for detente created on the Korean peninsula are the result of the proactive efforts of the DPRK and the unanimous desire and wish of all Koreans who are keen to open up the breakthrough to independent reunification by giving further momentum to the hard-won atmosphere for the improvement of the north-south relations.
					
					 The south Korean authorities often trumpet about valuing peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and improving the north-south relations whenever opportunities present themselves but outside they behave differently. This proves that their words do not match their acts.
					
					 Double-dealing stance can never work today.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities keep going against the nation's desire and wish, being pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, they will be made to face the same fate as the one met by the group of traitors.

					 The secretary general of the Romania-Korea Friendship Association said that Kim Il Sung led the two revolutionary wars and socialist construction to victory and turned the DPRK into an invincible fortress.

articles.title: Tiene lugar VI periodo de sesiones de la XIII Legislatura de la APS
articles.content:
Tiene lugar VI periodo de sesiones de la XIII Legislatura de la APS
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 11 en esta capital el VI periodo de sesiones de la XIII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En la ocasion participaron Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la APS de la RPDC, Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y del CC del PTC, Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y premier del Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC, los cuadros del Partido y el gobierno, el presidente del CC del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea, los diputados a la APS, los miembros del Presidium de la APS y los funcionarios responsables de los organos de fuerzas armadas.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en calidad de observador los funcionarios de los organismos del Partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, el Consejo de Ministros, las organizaciones sociales, ministerios, organos centrales, fabricas, empresas, granjas cooperativas y las instituciones de educacion e investigacion cientifica.
					
					La reunion determino los siguientes puntos de la agenda:
					
					1. Sobre el estado de trabajo del Consejo de Ministros en el 106 (2017) de la Era Juche para el cumplimiento de la Estrategia Quinquenal para el desarrollo de la economia nacional y sus tareas del 107 (2018) de la Era Juche
					
					2. Sobre el balance de la ejecucion de los presupuestos estatales de la RPDC en el 106 (2017) de la Era Juche y los presupuestos estatales para el 107 (2018) de la Era Juche
					
					3. Problema de organizacion
					
					El informe sobre el primer punto estuvo a cargo del diputado Pak Pong Ju, primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros.
					
					El diputado Ki Kwang Ho, ministro de Finanzas, presento el informe sobre el segundo punto.
					
					Hubo discursos de los diputados sobre el primer y segundo puntos.
					
					Los oradores adelantaron que los militares y habitantes coreanos lograron en el ano pasado un gran avance en el cumplimiento de la Estrategia Quinquenal para el desarrollo de la economia nacional, presentada por el VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					Expresaron apoyo y asentimiento a los puntos abordados diciendo que quedaron balanceados correctamente el trabajo del Consejo de Ministros y la ejecucion de los presupuestos estatales en el ano pasado, se definieron claramente las tareas del Consejo de Ministros y se compusieron bien los presupuestos estatales para el ano en curso.
					
					Tomaron la decision de cumplir su responsabilidad y desempeno en la lucha por consolidar el caracter independiente y autoctono de la economia nacional y mejorar los niveles de la vida del pueblo.
					
					En la reunion fueron aprobadas la resolucion de la APS "Sobre la aprobacion del informe sobre el trabajo del Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC y del balance de la ejecucion de los presupuestos estatales del 106 (2017) de la Era Juche" y la ley de la APS "Sobre los presupuestos estatales del 107 (2018) de la Era Juche de la RPDC".
					
					A continuacion, se debatio el tercer punto que es el problema de organizacion.
					
					Por la propuesta del Presidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC, la reunion removio al diputado Hwang Pyong So del cargo de vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y a los diputados Kim Ki Nam y Ri Man Gon y Kim Won Hong, del puesto de miembro del Comite de Estado de la RPDC.
					
					Por el encargo del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, eligio a los diputados Kim Jong Gak, Pak Kwang Ho, Thae Jong Su y Jong Kyong Thaek como miembros del Comite de Estado de la RPDC.
					
					Por el encargo del CC del PTC, la reunion depuso al diputado Pak Thae Song del puesto de miembro del Presidium de la APS debido al cambio de su cargo y eligio al diputado Jong Yong Guk como secretario general del Presidium de la APS y a los diputados Kim Su Gil, Pak Chol Min y Kim Chang Yop, como miembros del Presidium de la APS.
					
					El diputado Pak Thae Dok fue removido del cargo de miembro de la Comision de Legislacion de la APS y los diputados Ryang Jong Hun y Kim Myong Gil fueron elegidos como miembros de la Comision de Legislacion de la APS.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju balancea el trabajo del CM en 2017 y presenta sus tareas para 2018
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju balancea el trabajo del CM en 2017 y presenta sus tareas para 2018
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- En el VI periodo de sesiones de la XIII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema efectuado el dia 11, el diputado Pak Pong Ju, primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, presento el informe sobre el trabajo del CM en el 106 (2017) de la Era Juche para el cumplimiento de la Estrategia Quinquenal para el desarrollo de la economia nacional y sus tareas para el 107 (2018) de la Era Juche.
					Pak dijo que el ano pasado fue el de gran victoria en que se logro notable avance en la implementacion de la Estrategia Quinquenal para el desarrollo de la economia nacional superando los desafios sin precedentes surgidos en la ruta de nuestra marcha bajo la direccion destacada y probada del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					Segun su informe, en el ano pasado, el CM concentro las fuerzas estatales en aumentar y consolidar la base de produccion de electricidad, completar el sistema de produccion del hierro Juche y asegurar la independencia de la industria quimica, segun la Estrategia Quinquenal presentada por el partido. Asimismo, organizo y llevo a cabo la lucha por situar en una etapa mas alta la economia nacional en su conjunto dando enfoque a activar la produccion con equipos, materias primas y materiales domesticos en el principio de autoabastecimiento.
					
					En el fragor de la lucha de creacion, librada en el principio de autofortalecimiento en todas las ramas y entidades de la economia nacional, numerosas fabricas y empresas cumplieron el plan anual de producto industrial bruto y las entidades donde estan registradas las proezas de direccion del PTC cumplieron el plan anual de economia nacional.
					
					El premier apunto que los exitos alcanzados en el ano pasado, el clave para la implementacion de la Estrategia Quinquenal, comprobaron otra vez que ningun tipo de la campana de sancion y aplastamiento de EE.UU. y sus satelites para acabar con la soberania y derechos a existencia y desarrollo de la RPDC puede impedir el avance de esta, que marcha vigorosamente con la firme conviccion sobre la justeza de su causa y victoria final, y que triunfara sin falta la causa de construccion de una potencia socialista.
					
					Senalo que este ano, se presenta la tarea de abrir la brecha de activacion en todos los sectores de economia frustrando con una ofensiva general de todo el pueblo los desafios de las desesperadas fuerzas hostiles bajo la consigna combativa "!Alcancemos nuevos triunfos en todos los dominios de la construccion de la potencia socialista con una ofensiva general revolucionaria!".
					
					Se cumpliran sin falta la meta de lucha del tercer ano de la materializacion de la Estrategia Quinquenal tomando como tarea central la consolidacion del caracter independiente y autoctono de la economia nacional y el mejoramiento de los niveles de la vida poblacional, afirmo y continuo:
					
					Al sector de industria electrica incumbe la tarea de elevar a una etapa alta la produccion de electricidad con recursos termoelectricos al reparar y reforzar los deteriorados equipos de generacion electrica, tomar las medidas cientifico-tecnicas para reducir la norma de consumo de carbon y normalizar el funcionamiento de equipos generadores nuevamente instalados en el Complejo Termoelectrico de Pukchang.
					
					El sector de industria de carbon asume la tarea de cumplir mensual y trimestralmente la meta de produccion de carbon y preparar mayor cantidad de yacimientos carboniferos para cubrir plenamente las crecientes demandas de varios sectores de la economia nacional.
					
					El dominio de la industria metalurgica debe perfeccionar mas el autoctono sistema de produccion de hierro segun el alto horno basado en el calentamiento por el oxigeno y mejorar la calidad de acero y aumentar sus variedades mediante la introduccion de la tecnologia avanzada para satisfacer las necesidades de los materiales de hierro y acero de la economia nacional. 
					
					El sector de la industria quimica tiene que cumplir sin falta la meta de produccion de abono para asegurar a tiempo el abono nitrico necesario al dominio agricola, y activar la produccion del Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero a fin de suministrar suficientemente a varios dominios de la economia nacional el vinalon, la soda caustica, el cloruro de vinilo y otros articulos quimicos. 
					
					Es necesario acondicionar nuevas bases de produccion de catalizadores, impulsar la construccion del principal proceso productivo de la Fabrica de Fertilizante Fosforico de Sunchon y reconstruir y perfeccionar el proceso productivo del carbonato de soda con la glauberita como materia prima. 
					
					Al sector de industria mecanica le incumbe la tarea de dar buen impulso a la modernizacion de las fabricas de maquinaria, alcanzar incondicionalmente la meta de produccion de tractores y camiones de carga y elevar al nivel mundial la calidad de productos mecanicos. 
					
					Hay que incrementar la produccion de minerales y metales no ferrosos mediante la introduccion de los avanzados metodos de extraccion. 
					
					Le corresponde al sector de transporte ferroviario acarrear con responsabilidad las cargas necesarias a varios dominios de la economia nacional y la construccion de objetos importantes.
					
					El Consejo de Ministros registrara en este ano un auge productivo en los dominios de industria ligera, agricultura y pesqueria para traer un viraje en el mejoramiento de las condiciones de la vida del pueblo. 
					
					Es necesario remodelar los equipos y procesos productivos como los ahorradores de fuerza laboral y energia electrica, producir con materias primas y materiales domesticos mucho mas articulos de industria ligera de buena calidad y diferentes formas y desarrollar con originalidad la economia local a base de las fuentes propias de materias primas. 
					
					Se debe aplicar los metodos agricolas de alto rendimiento y aumentar decisivamente la proporcion de mecanizacion de las faenas agricolas para alcanzar sin falta la meta de produccion cerealera de este ano. 
					
					Hay que cumplir incondicionalmente la meta de produccion de pescados y, al mismo tiempo, terminar con antelacion la construccion de los establecimientos para consolidar la base material y tecnica de la rama pesquera. 
					
					Es imperioso concentrarse en acondicionar Samjiyon como el distrito modelo del socialismo, concluir a tiempo la construccion de la zona turistica costera Wonsan-Kalma e impulsar con dinamismo las obras importantes como la construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Tanchon y la de segunda etapa del canal de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur. 
					
					Para renovar la fisonomia del territorio nacional, se debe asegurar en mas de 90% la tasa de arraigo de los arboles plantados plantando, cuidando y abonando bien los arboles, reconstruir y reparar segun la norma tecnica las autopistas y carreteras turisticas y desarrollar el movimiento masivo para el mantenimiento de los principales recursos fluviales.
					
					Al dar mucha importancia a las ciencias y tecnicas, todas las ramas y entidades resolveran los problemas cientifico-tecnicos presentados en asegurar con recursos nacionales las materias primas, materiales y equipos y completar la estructura de la economia autarquica.
					
					El Consejo de Ministros y otros organos estatales de direccion economica deben trazar con posibilidades reales el plan de cumplimiento de las metas de este ano y ejecutarlo con responsabilidad y tenacidad mediante las operaciones y direccion diestras.
					
					Al cumplir asi con exito las metas de lucha presentadas por el Partido, deberan cumplir con su responsabilidad y deber en glorificar este ano del 70o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC como el de victoria que se registrara en letras mayusculas en la historia de la patria.

articles.title: Ki Kwang Ho presenta informe sobre los presupuestos del Estado
articles.content:
Ki Kwang Ho presenta informe sobre los presupuestos del Estado
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- En el sexto periodo de sesiones de la XIII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, efectuado el dia 11, el diputado Ki Kwang Ho, ministro de Finanzas, presento el informe sobre la ejecucion de los presupuestos estatales del 106 (2017) de la Era Juche y los mismos del 107 (2018) de la Era Juche.
					Segun el informe, el plan de ingresos de los presupuestos estatales del ano pasado se cumplio en 101.7 % y tuvo un crecimiento de 4.9% en comparacion con el ano 2016.
					
					El plan de ingresos del presupuesto local se cumplio en 100.5% y el de egresos estatales, en 99.8%.
					
					 El 15.8% del monto desembolsado fue asignado para el fortalecimiento de la capacidad militar del pais y el 47.7 % del monto total de egresos fue orientado al desarrollo de la economia nacional 
					
					La inversion en los sectores de ciencias y tecnicas crecio a 8.5% en relacion con el ano 2016, lo cual que contribuyo a resolver los problemas cientificos y tecnicos pendientes en el desarrollo de la economia y perfeccionar las tareas de investigacion de la rama sofisticada.
					
					El desembolso a los sectores principales de la economia nacional y al mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo aumento a 5.2% en comparacion con el ano 2016, lo cual impulso activamente la jucheanizacion de los dominios electrico, carbonico, metalico, quimico, mecanico y de industria ligera y la modernizacion de los procesos de produccion y, en particular, hizo aporte a construir el alto horno basado en el calentamiento por el oxigeno al estilo coreano en el Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek y alcanzar la meta de produccion de tractores y camiones de carga de nuevo tipo.
					
					  La inversion en la rama de construccion marco un aumento de 2.6% en comparacion con el ano 2016. 
					
					El 36.3% del monto total de los egresos fue invertido en las tareas para adelantar la construccion de la potencia civilizada socialista contribuyendo a materializar la politica del Partido en materia de dar importancia a la educacion y la salud publica y a desarrollar el deporte, la literatura y arte.
					
					Los ingresos y egresos de los presupuestos estatales del presente ano se establecieron conforme a la demanda del cumplimento de la Estrategia Quinquenal para el desarrollo de la economia nacional
					
					 Los ingresos de este ano ascenderan a 3.2% en comparacion con el ano pasado.
					
					 Entre ellos, se preven un incremento de 2.5% en los ingresos provenientes de transacciones, rubro principal de los ingresos de los presupuestos y el de 3.6% en los ingresos por ganancias de las empresas estatales y estos ocuparan el 85.3% del monto total de los ingresos.
					
					Ademas, se esperan los aumentos de 0.9%, 1.8%, 1.2% y 0.5% en los ingresos por ganancias de las entidades cooperativas, los pagos por el uso de propiedades inmuebles, las contribuciones para el seguro social y la venta de bienes y alteracion de precios, respectivamente.
					
					 Y se aumentaran a 100.8% los ingresos por otros conceptos y a 102.5% los ingresos de las zonas economicas y comerciales.
					
					 Seran 73.9% los ingresos presupuestarios centrales en los ingresos de los presupuestos estatales y se preven que los ingresos por la economia central abarcaran una proporcion predominante. Las provincias, las ciudades y los distritos cubriran el egreso con los ingresos propios y aportaran muchos fondos a los presupuestos centrales.
					
					Habra un alza de 5.1 % frente al ano pasado en los egresos de los presupuestos estatales de este ano.
					
					La inversion para intensificar el caracter independiente y el autoctono de la economia nacional y mejorar la vida del pueblo crecera a 4.9% en comparacion con el ano pasado, de manera que el 47.6% del monto total de los egresos se asignara a esta rama.
					
					  Llegara a 107.3% la inversion en el sector de ciencias y tecnicas y se aumentaran a 105.5% los egresos a la economia nacional en general incluyendo la industria electrica, la metalica, la carbonica, la quimica, el transporte ferroviario, la industria ligera, la agricultura y la pesquera.
					
					 Creceran a 104.9% los gastos para impulsar activamente la construccion de objetos importantes y ampliar mas los exitos de la campana de reforestacion.
					
					Ascenderan a 105.9%, 106%, 105.1% y 103% los gastos para la educacion, la salud publica, el deporte y la literatura y arte, por este orden.
					
					Ademas, sera destinado a la defensa nacional el 15.9% del monto total de egresos presupuestarios.
					
					Se enviaran este ano tambien muchos fondos a los hijos de los coreanos residentes en Japon como subsidios escolares y becas.
					
					Al final, el informante hizo enfasis en ejecutar con exito los presupuestos estatales de este ano al organizar con precision la operacion y el mando sobre la economia y apoyar con finanzas la construccion de la potencia socialista.

articles.title: Acto central por 6o aniversario de eleccion de Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Acto central por 6o aniversario de eleccion de Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 11 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el 6o aniversario de la eleccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un a los cargos supremos del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Estado.
					Asistieron Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del BP del CC del PTC, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y del CC del PTC, Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del BP del CC del PTC, vicepresidente del CE de la RPDC y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC, y otros cuadros del partido y el gobierno, el presidente del partido amigo, los funcionarios responsables de los organos de las fuerzas armadas, los diputados a la APS, los funcionarios del CC del PTC y los organismos de las fuerzas armadas, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los maestros, empleados y alumnos de la Escuela Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae y la Escuela Revolucionaria Kang Pan Sok, asi como los funcionarios e innovadores laborales de las instituciones, fabricas y empresas de esta capital.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Choe Ryong Hae.
					
					El orador dijo que la eleccion del Maximo Dirigente al cargo supremo de la revolucion coreana deviene la maxima gloria de la patria y el pueblo y el jubilo nacional de gran significacion historica para el cumplimiento de la causa del Juche, y prosiguio:
					
					Gracias a la direccion del Maximo Dirigente sobre el Partido y el Estado, se elevo mas la autoridad directiva del PTC, se manifestaron patentemente la posicion estrategica y el inagotable poderio de la RPDC y la revolucion coreana pudo avanzar con una conviccion cierta a la victoria final.
					
					Los ultimos 6 anos fueron los dias sorprendentes en que el poderio general de Corea socialista se ha asentado en el nivel supremo bajo la extraordinaria orientacion del Maximo Dirigente.
					
					La historia politica de la humanidad no conoce a otro heroe y patriota sin par como Kim Jong Un quien en tan corto plazo llevo al plano cimero la dignidad y posicion de un pais y una nacion y escribe nueva historia del fortalecimiento del poderio socialista.
					
					La patria y el pueblo no olvidaran, sino transmitiran de generacion en generacion la gran benevolencia y las hazanas patrioticas del Maximo Dirigente quien dio punto final a la amenaza agresiva de los imperialistas y preparo la garantia firme de la felicidad y el radiante porvenir para las generaciones venideras.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un es la fuerza potente de la Corea del Juche que ha exaltado a todo el mundo la dignidad independiente y el poderio de la patria y el gran Sol que conduce el siglo XXI.
					
					Al finalizar, exhorto a todos a luchar con dinamismo por la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche uniendose mas compactamente en torno al Maximo Dirigente.

articles.title: Clausurado el I Concurso Internacional de Musica Vocal de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Clausurado el I Concurso Internacional de Musica Vocal de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 12 en el Teatro Moranbong la ceremonia de clausura del I Concurso Internacional de Musica Vocal de Pyongyang, inaugurado el pasado dia 5 en esta capital. 
					Asistieron a la ocasion Pak Chun Nam, ministro de Cultura y presidente del comite organizador del evento, los funcionarios interesados, los creadores, artistas y profesores de las entidades artisticas centrales y planteles docentes de arte, los ganadores de premio del concurso, los artistas extranjeros, los jueces internacionales y los huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y los miembros de las embajadas de varios paises, acreditados en Corea. 
					
					En la ocasion fueron otorgados las copas, medallas y diplomas a los artistas sobresalientes y hubo la premiacion correspondiente. 
					
					Kim Kyong Ju (Corea) ocupo el primer lugar y Bayarsaikhan Batjargal (Mongolia) y Li Stanislav (Kazajstan) se ubicaron en el segundo.
					
					So Un Hyang (Corea), Ryu Kum Chol (Corea) y Martirosyan Marianna (Armenia) terminaron en el tercer puesto. 
					
					Baasansuren Enkhnaran (Mongolia) y Kapachinskikh Kirill (Kazajstan) recibieron el premio tecnico y el de interpretacion. 
					
					Pak Chun Nam pronuncio el discurso de clausura. 
					
					Terminada la ceremonia, se ofrecio la funcion de los ganadores del concurso.

articles.title: Abierto seminario internacional de Pyongyang sobre la epoca y el arte musical
articles.content:
Abierto seminario internacional de Pyongyang sobre la epoca y el arte musical
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar hoy el Seminario Internacional de Pyongyang sobre la Epoca y el Arte Musical-2018 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo.
					Asistieron a la ocasion Pak Chun Nam, ministro de Cultura y presidente del comite organizador del I Concurso Internacional de Musica Vocal de Pyongyang, los funcionarios, creadores y artistas de la rama de cultura y arte, los profesores e investigadores de los planteles docentes de arte, los miembros del jurado internacional, los huespedes honorarios y los miembros de conjuntos artisticos y delegaciones de varios paises participantes en el 31o Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera. 
					
					Hubo la palabra de felicitacion e intervenciones. 
					
					Los oradores alabaron al Dirigente Kim Jong Il como gran maestro de ideologia y teoria y politico musical sin igual quien aclaro de manera cientifica la naturaleza y la mision de la musica y a base de ello, concedio al arte musical la posicion de un componente de las humanidades. 
					
					Explicaron y argumentaron profundamente el caracter cientifico y justo de la autoctona idea y teoria sobre el arte musical, presentados por el Dirigente, y se refirieron a las valiosas experiencias adquiridas en la creacion de las operas al estilo coreano que situaron en un plano alto la descripcion musical y las correlaciones entre las letras y melodias de las canciones. 
					
					En la actualidad, el mantenimiento consecuente de la nacionalidad se presenta como un asunto muy importante en la creacion musical, dijeron y enfatizaron que los vocalistas pueden ser cantantes populares cuando reflejen bien en su interpretacion artistica la idiosincrasia nacional y la estetica moderna teniendo la correcta concepcion sobre esta ultima. 
					
					En el foro fue aprobada una carta dirigida al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
